member.summary: Human readable description of the access granted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Acl.Items
member.summary: The list of ACL entries.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Acl.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this resource as an access control list. Value: "orkut#acl"

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Acl.TotalParticipants
member.summary: The total count of participants of the parent resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Acl.ItemsData.Id
member.summary: The ID of the entity. For entities of type "person" or "circle", this is the ID of the resource. For other types, this will be unset.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Acl.ItemsData.Type
member.summary: The type of entity to whom access is granted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Id
member.summary: The ID for the activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Kind
member.summary: The kind of activity. Always orkut#activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Links
member.summary: Links to resources related to this activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Object
member.summary: The activity's object.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Published
member.summary: The time at which the activity was initially published.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Title
member.summary: Title of the activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Updated
member.summary: The time at which the activity was last updated.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.Verb
member.summary: This activity's verb, indicating what action was performed. Possible values are: - add - User added new content to profile or album, e.g. video, photo. - post - User publish content to the stream, e.g. status, scrap. - update - User commented on an activity. - make-friend - User added a new friend. - birthday - User has a birthday.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.ObjectData
member.summary: The activity's object.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.ObjectData.Content
member.summary: The HTML-formatted content, suitable for display. When updating an activity's content, post the changes to this property, using the value of originalContent as a starting point. If the update is successful, the server adds HTML formatting and responds with this formatted content.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.ObjectData.Items
member.summary: The list of additional items.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.ObjectData.ObjectType
member.summary: The type of the object affected by the activity. Clients can use this information to style the rendered activity object differently depending on the content.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Orkut.v2.Data.Activity.ObjectData.Replies
member.summary: Comments in reply to this activity.

member.summary: Comments in reply to this activity.

member.summary: The list of comments.

member.summary: Total number of comments.
